name: Whisperer in Darkness
description: The Whisperer in Darkness is a Medium Aberration, notable for its impressive intelligence, standing with advanced magical implements and possessing a unique appearance.
memorable: This creature wields powerful spells and can stun foes with its grasp attacks, making it a terrifying adversary.
goals: Its usual goals include manipulating battles and controlling the minds of its opponents.
relations: It may be found in the company of other aberrations or as a servant to powerful entities.
environment: Typically found in dark, mystical areas where it can exert its influence.
strengths: Possesses truesight and high intelligence, allowing it to see through illusions and manipulate situations to its advantage.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks that bypass its resistances.
attacks: Employs two Grasp of the Void attacks, dealing force damage and possibly stunning targets.
most_powerful_ability: Can cast devastating spells like meteor swarm and feeblemind once per day, significantly affecting its foes.
equipment: Carries advanced magical implements that enhance its mystical capabilities.
senses: Has truesight out to 120 feet, allowing it to see through illusions and invisibility.
skills: Excels in arcana and deception, indicating its knowledge of the arcane and ability to manipulate others.
additional_information: Immune to psychic and poison damage
Resistant to cold, fire, lightning, and nonmagical physical damage from non-silver attacks
Condition immunities include frightened, charmed, and poisoned.
Commanding presence with high passive perception.
Advanced spellcasting capabilities, requiring no material components.
spellcasting: Innate spellcasting based on Intelligence with a high spell save DC of 20, allowing for versatile combat and manipulation.
test_queries: creature with truesight and spellcasting abilities
manipulative monster using fear and confusion
intelligent being that can stun opponents
spellcaster that looks like an aberration
